channel.title: Why does the game end when you enter the ailen's world
channel.description:
I'm new to black mesa and i am playing i heard it ends at that time. Is it possible for you to continue the game. Also will you remake Blue Shift and oppising force.
~Tyler

item.title: Why does the game end when you enter the ailen's world
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Also, no, they’re not remaking blue shift and opposing force. Other teams are doing that. Next time you want to ask a question about mod related stuff, please use this thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the game end when you enter the ailen's world

item.title: Why does the game end when you enter the ailen's world
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Xen (the alien world) wasn’t included in the mod release but it will be released in the future when it’s ready.

No one knows when it will be ready, so it could either be next month or next year.

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the game end when you enter the ailen's world
